item.title: Water overflowing on pavemt, 17th July
item.description:
As well as the report of water flowing from outside No 38, there is a 2nd leak in between the Plaice to Be and the vape ship next door. This is also flowing across the pavement and has been for weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Widmore, London

item.title: Mattress dumped, 17th July
item.description:
A mattress has been dumped outside our house - it has been there about a week, and is an awful eye sore and is attracting vermin

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mountgrove Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Overflowing bins next to a doctor’s surgery, 17th July
item.description:
Despite attempts to log this with both Hackney and the previous contractors who oversee this park- Valley Provincial- the 4 bins remain overflowing and I emptied for the last few weeks. Please try and resolve ASAP. It’s a worsening situation currently.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodmill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The gents toilet is disgusting. No soap. Filthy toilets. A HEALTH HAZARD. Please get this fixed., 17th July
item.description:
The toilets by the back of the cafe in the Children's playground are filthy and a health hazard. No soap toilets are really dirty. If this is not dealt with I will write to the Beckenham MP. CHILDREN ARE AT RISK. PLEASE ACTION
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Non resident starting a fire on wick road again, 17th July
item.description:
This is becoming a daily occurrence! Non residents/strangers are coming and causing hours long smoke and smell that residents are forced to put up with! Different people were here doing the same yesterday

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wick Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular dumping spot, 17th July
item.description:
People regularly just dump things at this corner. Can cameras or some other deterrent be put here?

item.title: Key hub, 17th July
item.description:
Hi I have been ringing the council for the last 4 weeks regarding my key hub when I moved in to the property I only received one and having to keep ringing my neighbours door to get in the building I pay my rent and council tax on time and I’m not happy
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Loddiges Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dog fouling all along Almack Road, 17th July
item.description:

item.title: Rubbish isn't being collected, 17th July
item.description:
Good afternoon, The rubbish outside our office isn't being collected and its starting to smell and also is becoming a hazard when walking up the road. Please can it be collected today? Kind regards, Abi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21-22, Great Castle Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
